item.title: Trump’s Chinese Student Visa Policy Is An Un-American Security Risk
item.description: The correct number of Chinese nationals who should be allowed to study at American universities is zero.

item.title: United Nations Report: ‘Slavery’-Like Rent-A-Womb Industry Should Be Globally Banned
item.description: 'Consent alone does not render surrogacy ethical. It is widely recognized that consent alone cannot justify human rights violations,' the report says.

item.title: Court Says Pennsylvania Must Count Mail Ballots With Improperly Dated Envelopes
item.description: The reprinted outer envelope has a colorful box where voters write the date they voted, but somehow, thousands of voters miss the date
